verses.text: Mamin Jehov치, a in rey in tik, tzin tzalaji, yujto syal uuj smasanil. Yelxo wal tzin te tzalaji, yujto uuj wal ix wak' ganar.
Ix a b'o tas snib'ej in k'ool, maj a tenek'laj tas ix in k'ana'.
Te niwan wach'il ix ak' t'ayin, ix ak'ank'e jun corona oro t'a in jolom.
Ix in k'an t'ayach to tzak' najatb'oc in k 'inal, a achxo ix ak' t'ayin.
Te b'inajnac in yuj a colwal. Uuj wal syal wuuj, ay pax in tziquiquial.
Manh jantacoc a wach'k'olal ix ak' t'ayin t'a masanil tiempo. Ste tzalaj in k'ool t'a ichanh.
Mamin Jehov치, ek'al ach t'a yib'anh masanil, yujto a a wach'k'olal ayoch yipoc in k'ool, yuj chi' malaj b'ak'uinh ol in ak'joc ganar.
Mamin rey, ol a yam masanil heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach, aton heb' malaj snib'ej tzach yila'.
Ayic ol a ch'oxan a b'ha t'a skal heb', ol a satankanel heb', icha wal tz'aj junok tas slajwiel yuj k'ak'. Ha Jehov치 ol satanel heb' yet' yowal sk'ool, haxo k'ak' ol ak'an lajwoquel heb'.
Ha yuninal heb' ajk'ool chi' yet' heb' yinhtilal heb', ol a satkanel heb' t'a skal anima t'a sat lu'um tik.
Wach'chom ix snib'ej heb' ix ach yixtej, ix say wal modo heb' tas tz'aj ach yak'an ganar, palta maj yal-laj yuj heb',
yujto a ach tik ix a pechcanb'at heb' ayic ix och ijan a jul-lab' t'a heb'.
Mamin Jehov치, ach ik'jokab'chaanh yujto masanil syal uuj. Ol ko b'itej ipalil.
